r.d:
OAuth is an authorization protocol built on top of HTTP which allows applications to securely access data without having to store usernames and passwords.
Requirements: ext/hash and libcurl (with https support if you plan to access resources over https).
r.n: - Fixed PECL bug #15110 #15111 (ZTS build, Segfault and memory leak, hannes/felipe) + other memleaks - Fixed PECL bug #15112 (incorrect cvs branch) - Updated fetch to respect additional request params, added examples and TODO - Updates for 5.3 - Support for older libcurl versions - Added arginfo - Marking as beta
